txt.en: 'While I find the hides of these avanc to be fascinating, the construction of their nests upon the shores of the Limlight will make travel between my village in Mirkwood and the south very dangerous.\n\n'Would you go to their breeding grounds and destroy their nests? Perhaps that will drive them from the shore.'
'You have done well, [placeholder]. As long as the avanc remain inland, my people should remain safe.'
The avanc-nests along the Limlight have become a danger to those travelling south from Mirkwood.

Avanc-nests can be found at their breeding grounds, north-west of the Woodman camp in the Rushgore.\n\nAmal has asked you to destroy the avanc-nests in hopes of driving the creatures from the shores of the Limlight.
Talk to Amal at the Woodman camp in the Rushgore
Amal is at the Woodman camp in the Rushgore, south-east of the avanc breeding grounds.\n\nYou should return to Amal with news of your success.
